entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -27.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

Temperature: -27.9°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -31.7°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
